info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 10:22PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LAPEER... NORTHEASTERN OAKLAND...NORTHWESTERN MACOMB AND NORTHWESTERN ST. CLAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1021 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Metamora to near Oxford to 6 miles northwest of Rochester. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Imlay City, Romeo, Almont, Yale, Capac, Rochester, Armada, Memphis, Dryden, Emmett, Lum, Rochester Hills, Attica, Brockway, Leonard, Goodland Township, Lakeville, Lynn Township, Riley Center, and Allenton. This includes I-69 between mile markers 162 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
